body.p:
Grigsby &. Robinson,
John J Hawes.
Lexington, Ky. Septr 22 1865.
Hon E L Van Winkle
Sec State Ky
Frankfort Ky
Sir

I have the honor to respectfully request that a Commission as Notary Public for the County of "Fayette" be granted to Mr D W Cobb of this City, who is assisting me in my office here in transaction of the business of "Claim Agent". I enlose the Sum of ($2) Two Dollars amt of Fees in my application, also (2$) Two Dollars for the application for part above mentioned,

I am Sir
Very Respectfully
Yours &c
John J. Hawes
Atty at Law.

Notary Public
Fayette Co
D W Cobb
apptd
22 Sept/65
